verses.verse: A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4148>instruction:<s%> but a <S%H3887>scorner<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> not <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>

A <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> by the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> but the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H898>transgressors<s%> shall eat <S%H2555>violence.<s%>
He that <S%H5341>keeps<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> his <S%H5315>life:<s%> but he that <S%H6589>opens<s%> wide his <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall have <S%H4288>destruction.<s%>
The <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> <S%H183>desires,<s%> and has <S%H369>nothing:<s%> but the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H2742>diligent<s%> shall be made <S%H1878>fat.<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H1697>lying:<s%> <S%H8367><s%> but a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man is <S%H887>loathsome,<s%> and comes to <S%H2659>shame.<s%>
<S%H6666>Righteousness<s%> <S%H5341>keeps<s%> him that is <S%H8537>upright<s%> in the <S%H1870>way:<s%> but <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H5557>overthrows<s%> the <S%H2403>sinner.<s%>
There is that makes himself <S%H6238>rich,<s%> yet has <S%H3808>nothing:<s%> <S%H3605><s%> there is that makes himself <S%H7326>poor,<s%> yet has <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1952>riches.<s%>
The <S%H3724>ransom<s%> of a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%> are his <S%H6239>riches:<s%> but the <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> not <S%H1606>rebuke.<s%>
The <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices:<s%> but the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H1846>put<s%> out.
<S%H7535>Only<s%> by <S%H2087>pride<s%> <S%H5414>comes<s%> <S%H4683>contention:<s%> but with the well <S%H3289>advised<s%> is <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
<S%H1952>Wealth<s%> gotten by <S%H1892>vanity<s%> shall be <S%H4591>diminished:<s%> but he that <S%H6908>gathers<s%> by <S%H3027>labor<s%> shall <S%H7235>increase.<s%>
<S%H8431>Hope<s%> <S%H4900>deferred<s%> makes the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2470>sick:<s%> but when the <S%H8378>desire<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> it is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Whoever <S%H936>despises<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> shall be <S%H2254>destroyed:<s%> but he that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> shall be <S%H7999>rewarded.<s%>
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
<S%H2896>Good<s%> <S%H7922>understanding<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2580>favor:<s%> but the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H898>transgressors<s%> is <S%H386>hard.<s%>
<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H6175>prudent<s%> man <S%H6213>deals<s%> with <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> but a <S%H3684>fool<s%> lays <S%H6566>open<s%> his <S%H200>folly.<s%>
A <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> into <S%H7451>mischief:<s%> but a <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H4832>health.<s%>
<S%H7389>Poverty<s%> and <S%H7036>shame<s%> shall be to him that <S%H6544>refuses<s%> <S%H4148>instruction:<s%> but he that <S%H8104>regards<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> shall be <S%H3513>honored.<s%>

The <S%H8378>desire<s%> <S%H1961>accomplished<s%> is <S%H6149>sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul:<s%> but it is <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3684>fools<s%> to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
He that <S%H1980>walks<s%> with <S%H2450>wise<s%> men shall be <S%H2449>wise:<s%> but a <S%H7462>companion<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall be <S%H7321>destroyed.<s%>
<S%H7451>Evil<s%> <S%H7291>pursues<s%> <S%H2400>sinners:<s%> but to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> shall be <S%H7999>repaid.<s%>

A <S%H2896>good<s%> man leaves an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children:<s%> and the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> is <S%H6845>laid<s%> up for the <S%H6662>just.<s%>
<S%H7230>Much<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> is in the <S%H5215>tillage<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor:<s%> but there is that is <S%H5595>destroyed<s%> for <S%H3808>want<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
He that <S%H2820>spares<s%> his <S%H7626>rod<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> his <S%H1121>son:<s%> but he that <S%H157>loves<s%> him <S%H4148>chastens<s%> him <S%H7836>betimes.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> to the <S%H7648>satisfying<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul:<s%> but the <S%H990>belly<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H2637>want.<s%>
